participant_1.background:
I wake up early to get a head start on my day, and I make sure to schedule time for soccer practice and spending time with my kids.
I'm not as open about my interests as I would like to be, but I love baseball and fishing.
i had two cats growing up.
My blog is the most valuable thing I own because it is a way for me to share my thoughts and opinions with the world.
I keep to myself because I am afraid of being judged.

participant_2.background:
My internal arguments are often more interesting than my conversations with others.
I'm not so worried about the weather because I don't have kids.
I practice my guitar for hours every day, hoping to make it big in the local music scene.
i wait for something interesting to happen each day.
My weight is 160 pounds.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
Pretty good. I'm just practicing my guitar.
Oh, that's cool. What kind of music do you play?
I play a lot of different kinds of music, but I mostly play rock and blues.
Nice. Do you ever play any shows?
Not yet, but I'm hoping to start playing some local shows soon.
That's great. I'm sure you'll do great.
So, what do you do for fun when you're not playing music?
I like to go fishing, watch baseball, and spend time with my family.
Nice. I like to go fishing too. What kind of fish do you like to catch?
I like to catch bass and trout.
Those are both good fish. I like to catch catfish.
So, what's your favorite thing about fishing?
I like the peace and quiet of being on the water.
Me too. It's a great way to relax.
